title: mcreator问题：前言中不允许有内容
author: 创世神2613
txt_content:
我最近想开发一个mod，就用了这款软件，材质画好设置调好之后，生成的时候却是前言中不允许有内容刷屏，求解决方法！
CONSOLE代码：
Executing gradle command: build MCreator was not able to connect to the internet. Gradle tasks are not going to work. Please consider using the daemon: http://gradle.org/docs/2.0/userguide/gradle_daemon.html.
